nodes.text: An Ordnance/Regional Depot was a planet that served as a military outpost. Around 12,000 BBY, the Mid Rim planet Ord Mantell became an Ordnance/Regional Depot after its colonization.
Ordnance/Regional Depots were mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the forty-eighth issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around December 2, 2015.
